channel.title: How come i can't get the npc's to move?
channel.description:
I just added some Shades(monsters) in varrock. the Thing is they wont move any where. They just sit there. :confused: Help please.
This is what i put in the autospawn.cfg
[code]//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 430 3217 3460 0 3177 3465 3196 3460 1 Shade spawn = 429 3211 3465 0 3177 3465 3196 3460 1 Shade spawn = 430 3214 3466 0 3177 3465 3196 3460 1 Shade spawn = 428 3215 3462 0 3177 3465 3196 3460 1 Shade spawn = 430 3209 3463 0 3200 3464 3214 3483 1 Shade[/code]
Any problems with it?
by the way my ip is "71.35.229.170"

item.title: How come i can't get the npc's to move?
item.dc:creator: @skill_pk1 skill_pk
item.description:
@skill_pk1 wrote:

[quote=“Lil Brudder (-_-), post:1, topic:7707”]I just added some Shades(monsters) in varrock. the Thing is they wont move any where. They just sit there. Help please.

This is what i put in the autospawn.cfg

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 430 3217 3460 0 3177 3465 3196 3460 1 Shade spawn = 429 3211 3465 0 3177 3465 3196 3460 1 Shade spawn = 430 3214 3466 0 3177 3465 3196 3460 1 Shade spawn = 428 3215 3462 0 3177 3465 3196 3460 1 Shade spawn = 430 3209 3463 0 3200 3464 3214 3483 1 Shade

Any problems with it?

by the way my ip is “71.35.229.170”[/quote]

i think the problem is that you cant make the npcs go to the same spot. try to make the coordinates for the walking location different

Are the ID numbers really for NPC:Shade?
